description: Manage Access Policy Assignments (Redis Users) for Redis Cache.

commands.name: az redis access-policy-assignment create
commands.summary: Add an Access Policy Assignment (Redis User) to the Redis Cache.
examples: az redis access-policy-assignment create -g testResourceGroup -n testCacheName --object-id 932b5c60-66e4-4fbf-b8b0-xxxxxxxxxxxx --object-id-alias testAlias --access-policy-name testAccessPolicy --policy-assignment-name testAccessPolicyAssignment

commands.name: az redis access-policy-assignment delete
commands.summary: Delete the Access Policy Assignment (Redis User).
examples: az redis access-policy-assignment delete -g testResourceGroup -n testCacheName --policy-assignment-name testAccessPolicyAssignment

commands.name: az redis access-policy-assignment list
commands.summary: Get the list of Access Policy Assignments (Redis Users) associated with the Redis Cache.
examples: az redis access-policy-assignment list -g testResourceGroup -n testCacheName

commands.name: az redis access-policy-assignment show
commands.summary: Get the detailed information about an Access Policy Assignment (Redis User) of the Redis Cache.
examples: az redis access-policy-assignment show -g testResourceGroup -n testCacheName --policy-assignment-name testAccessPolicyAssignment

commands.name: az redis access-policy-assignment update
commands.summary: Update an Access Policy Assignment (Redis User) of the Redis Cache.
examples: az redis access-policy-assignment update -g testResourceGroup -n testCacheName --object-id 932b5c60-66e4-4fbf-b8b0-xxxxxxxxxxxx --object-id-alias testAlias --access-policy-name testAccessPolicy --policy-assignment-name testAccessPolicyAssignment
